1.content:
Note: I'm too lazy to develope a 100% unique set of rule's. (All the good ideas were taken anyway) But I'll try to do th best I can.
It's been 75 years since the 'vores' took over. Nowaday's Women are both sociealy superior to men and have quite the swelled head about it. Approximently 19 years ago, A secret Government project called "Project Fahler", named after a famous resistance, was started.
It's goal was to create 'Super-Soldiers' to combat vore criminals, because normal law enforcement were being swamped. New breakthroughs in Bio-engineering have allowed the government to finaly complete the project successfuly. After 19 years of toil Fahler managed to produce 4 'Super Soldiers'
Alex Feyun - An 17 year old 'white' 'infiltrator' ment to 'blend in'
Rachel Bennity- An Atrractive 'Asian' Girl of 18 who can mimic voices with uncanny accuracy.
Marc Gyt - A muscular 16 year-old 'Black' teen, who specializes in breaking up 'Gangs'.
Marcia Matter - A 'shy' 17 year-old book-worm who acts as the group's 'Information Finder'.
All Members are born with increased strength, speed and reflexes; as well as the ability to vore. Teleportation abilities were genetically bred into them. Their sole purpose is to protect the public when the police arn't around. All four bear a specal badge that places them 'Above' Vore-codes. (The Laws which define what a 'vore-crime' truely is)
You will become one of the four Hero's what you do with your power's, is a choice I leave to you...
1.title: The Story Begins

choices: Be a stuckup Vore capable girl
15.content: You want to be a different charcter? O.K. then. How about one of these?
15.title: Other

info.brief_description: Become an Anti-Vore and Strike back...
info.description:
Set in a world where Females dominate and control everything through their vore abillities, You are among the first of an Eliet squad ment to combat the rise in vore criminals
Everything goes except for Anal Vore. Keep it "same-size" if you could. Read Chapter 1 for more info.
